join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add error (_TESTING_ERROR_)
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Command 'error' added, restricted to subscribers and above.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!error hello
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add notexist (_THISDOESNTEXIST_)
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Command 'notexist' added, restricted to subscribers and above.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!notexist hello
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add nestederror (_HEY_(_TESTING_ERROR_)_)
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Command 'nestederror' added, restricted to subscribers and above.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!nestederror hello
no_send
